spyglassmc.commands.dataHackPubify.title: Data Hack Pubify
spyglassmc.commands.showCacheRoot.title: Open Cache Folder
spyglassmc.commands.showOutput.title: Show Output
spyglassmc.description: Heavy language features for Minecraft: Java Edition data pack files
spyglassmc.env.gameVersion: The Minecraft version to use. When set to auto, the version is inferred from the `pack.mcmeta`. Other versions can be specified in a `spyglass.json` config file. Need to restart Spyglass to apply changes.
spyglassmc.env.enableMcdocCaching:
Whether to enable caching of mcdoc simplified types.

 May become corrupt after changing game versions, so this is currently disabled by default.
spyglassmc.env.useFilePolling:
Makes the file-watcher use polling to watch for file changes. Comes at a performance cost for very large datapacks.

 On Windows, enabling this can fix file-lock issues when Spyglass is running. See: https://github.com/SpyglassMC/Spyglass/issues/1414. Need to restart Spyglass to apply changes.

 **You should only consider enabling this for Windows machines.**
spyglassmc.trace.server: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Spyglass Language Server.
